title: Daily Missions Issuw
body: Why don't i get daily missions? Is there something about the icon? Please help.

replies.body:
Were you looking for the first win of the day mission or hoping for more Worlds oriented missions?

The new first win of the day mission is set to restart when you last completed it I believe.
The First Win mission yes i do receive it but i don't have other missions like 3 daily missions as people said
I think you might be looking at older posts during the World's Missions. Those missions have expired since they were only around while Worlds was going on.
I did all of the World Missions, but Daily Missions don't appear on my account

The only "daily" missions would be the First Win of the Day mission, which you *have* been completing on a regular basis. I see where you completed it today, as well as yesterday and the day before too.
